original_title: ５年ぶりに再会した中学時代の静かな同級生が種付け懇願しまくる凄いドＭに豹変してた…
overview: A girl who didn't have a single friend when she was in junior high school. She happened to find someone who looked like her on SNS, and for some reason she was interested in her and sent an email, and she replied, "Let's meet." When she was reunited, her voice and smile hadn't changed, but her looks and personality seemed a little smarter. At the end of her date, "What are you going to do after this?" In contrast to me, who was nervous, she suddenly attacked me.
title: My Quiet Classmate From Junior High Turned Into A Total Sex Fiend When I Met Her 5 Years Later, Starring Maika
